title: Will provisional and final results be same?
content:
Please tell me will provisional results be same as final result
Or will final result vary from provisional results?

comments.body: If you apply for re-evaluation and your grades (not only marks) increase then final result will vary otherwise will be the same

No I got a  pass in all the subjects in provisional results will it remain the same even in final results if I don't apply for re-evaluation.
I got E in a subject will it Even remain same
